definition: Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China/surname Miao

sentences.english: She cut down the sapling with one chop.
sentences.chinese: 她一斧子就把树苗砍倒了。

sentences.english: He was told not to tread the earth round the roots of the seedling.
sentences.chinese: 他被吩咐不可把树苗根部周围的土踩硬。

sentences.english: Seeds grow in cones, which themselves are then dispersed by wind, falling to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 种子在球果生长，随后被风吹落到地面上，长成树苗。

sentences.english: She plucked some leaves off the sapling.
sentences.chinese: 她从树苗上摘下一些叶子。

sentences.english: Where to there is the virgin pear seedling in Nanning sell?
sentences.chinese: 南宁哪里有黄花梨树苗卖？

sentences.english: They've found a newly sprouted sapling.
sentences.chinese: 它们找到一棵刚发芽的树苗。

sentences.english: In spring, we dug many holes on the mountain and planted saplings.
sentences.chinese: 挖了许多坑子，种下了许多树苗。

sentences.english: The wind tore at the newly planted sapling .
sentences.chinese: 风猛列地撕扯着栽的树苗。

sentences.english: The new resistanttrees will be planted in bristlecone habitat.
sentences.chinese: 新培育的具抵抗力的树苗就栽种到针毬松生长区。

sentences.english: Nung-fu brought home a redwood seedling and planted it in a pot.
sentences.chinese: 农夫带回一株红木小树苗，把它种在盆子里。

sentences.english: Will you come back when my sapling grow up to a big tree?
sentences.chinese: 那等到我种的树苗长成大树，你肯定就回来了吧？

sentences.english: Put the tree in the hole next to the stick so that it is straight.
sentences.chinese: 将树苗挨着棍子放进坑里面，这样它就会直上生长。

sentences.english: Then the boys dug pits and girls planted the young trees into the pits.
sentences.chinese: 接着男孩子挖坑，女孩子帮树苗种到坑里。

sentences.english: The foresters spaced the seedlings out in rows.
sentences.chinese: 林务员把树苗一行行等距栽种。

sentences.english: It becomes a weak, frail sapling.
sentences.chinese: 它变成了一棵虚弱的小树苗。

definition: classifier for trees, cabbages, plants etc
Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
tree trunk/stump (tree root)/a plant/classifier for trees or plants/strain (biology)/to involve others (in shady business)
